name: The Stan Lee Legacy Collection: Portraits by Rob Prior

metadata.name: The Amazing Life of Stan Lee – Amazing Spider-Man No. 135 (1974)
metadata.title: The Amazing Life of Stan Lee – Amazing Spider-Man No. 135 (1974)
metadata.description:
“I wanted to show the faces of Stan throughout time. I considered leaving the punisher in this cover, but it just didn’t fit. In the end, this is one of my favorites in the series.”

Comic cover parody featuring Stan Lee; 60x41 gouache on aquavilla. Original cover by John Romita Sr.

title.description: The Amazing Life of Stan Lee – Amazing Spider-Man No. 135 (1974)
